snippet.title: Drums Rock - Official Steam Launch
snippet.description:
Drums Rock is now available in its official version on Steam!

Drums Rock is an arcade drum game for VR, follow the rock rhythm with your drums and crush the demons. Each note is represented by an enemy, and they will be defeated by playing the drums.

Enjoy this new update with tons of new songs, new cosmetics, a Collaboration with Blasphemous, and the long-awaited Custom Songs feature.

We also officially announce that the Undertale DLC will be available soon.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1906020/Drums_Rock/

Meta Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/6378164228868127/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayDrumsRock

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DrumsRockVR

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/drumsrockvr/

Web: http://garage51.es/drumsrock/

#VR #VRGaming #Steam #Metaverse #Steam #SteamVR #Gaming #undertale
